briefTitle: Mesalamine 4 g Sachet for the Induction of Remission in Active, Mild to Moderate Ulcerative Colitis (UC)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter Study Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of Mesalamine 4 g Extended Release Granules (Sachet) for the Induction of Clinical and Endoscopic Remission in Active, Mild to Moderate Ulcerative Colitis
summary: The purpose of this trial is to investigate the efficacy of mesalamine for the induction of clinical and endoscopic remission in subjects with active, mild to moderate UC. Subject will receive 4 g extended release granules (sachet) once daily.
